item.description:
Joe Markley, former State Senator from the Southington area, is running again for his old seat. I've known Joe for over a year now. He's a true conservative - promoting limited government and personal freedoms, and his legislative record has proven this in the past. Joe was instrumental in organizing the "Axe the Tax" rally in Hartford in 1991 and is now a leading advocate for the conservative coalition in CT.

Joe says:
A large turnout would be a terrific boost. We have a good program shaping up, with both tea party folks (including Tanya) and political friends (like Tom Scott and Dick Bozzuto). I hope you will plan on joining me.

Hope to see you there! Jim
item.name: Joe Markley, State Senate Candidate Kickoff Rally, Southington Green
